Event: In 2015, Company X ranked as the biggest company\nin the clothing market
Before that, Company X owned about 9000 stores\nand had an income of over 10 billion
Before that, Company X  owned 6000 stores across\nthe country, even in small counties
Before that, Company X owned 2000 stores in 50\ncities
Before that, Company X got a 40 million investment
Before that, Company X expanded its market quickly
Before that, a 20-year-old young man started a\nclothing company called Company X in 2009
However after 2015 when Company X ranked as the\nbiggest company in the clothing market
Then, the clothing market began to shrink due to the\nrise of E-commerce
Then, the sales of Company X decreased nearly 1/4
Then, Company X was stuck in great debt due to its\noverstocked commodities
Then, Company X shut down 2400 stores
At last, Company X declared bankruptcy under the\nstrike of coronavirus
